site_name: LEWISHAM GATEWAY SITE,LAND BETEWEEN RENNELL STREET & LEWISHAM RAILWAY STATION, LONDON, SE13
description: Observations requested by Lewisham Council for Notification as further information has been submitted by the applicant (dated 14th December 2016) in relation to the Environmental Statement Addendum (dated 27th September 2016) as submitted on in support of the above planning application. An application submitted under Section 73 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990 for Minor Material Amendments in connection with the planning permission DC/06/62375 (granted on 8 May 2009) for the comprehensive mixed use redevelopment of the Lewisham Gateway Site, SE13 (land between Rennell Street and Lewisham Railway Station) for up to 100,000mÂ² comprising retail (A1, A2, A3, A4 and A5), offices (B1), hotel (C1), residential (C3), education/health (D1) and leisure (D2) with parking and associated infrastructure, as well as open space and water features. The amendments comprise amendments to the floorspace allocated to the approved uses (no increase in total floorspace), amendments to the physical parameters of Blocks C1, C2, D1, D2 and E including raising the height of blocks, changes to the footprints and massing, omission of Block F and basement car parking, and associated changes.
